lead_paragraph: Mr. Macri will use the money, $1.3 million, to buy Argentine treasury bonds, a vote of confidence that the country’s economy will rebound.

headline.main: Argentine President Mauricio Macri Will Repatriate Savings From Bahamas

snippet: Mr. Macri will use the money, $1.3 million, to buy Argentine treasury bonds, a vote of confidence that the country’s economy will rebound.
abstract: Argentine Pres Mauricio Macri says he will buy Argentine treasury bonds with $1.3 million in savings repatriated from Bahamanian accounts; move is show of confidence in country's flagging economy and follows criticism of leader's role in offshore investments revealed in Panama Papers.
